original_title: No-confidence motion on Speaker handed over
original_body_lines: The no-confidence motion on Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena was handed over to Deputy Secretary General of Parliament Chaminda Kularatne a short while ago.
It was handed over by Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella, MPs Ranjith Madduma Bandara and Professor G.L. Peiris.
